verses.verse: וַיָּבִ֙יאוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> So they brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיַּצִּ֣יגוּ <S%H3322><s%> and set אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> it in the midst הָאֹ֔הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tent אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָֽטָה־ <S%H5186><s%> had pitched ל֖וֹ דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> that David וַיַּקְרִ֛יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> for it and they offered עֹל֥וֹת <S%H5930><s%> burnt sacrifices וּשְׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> and peace offerings לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

וַיְכַ֣ל <S%H3615><s%> had made an end דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> And when David מֵהַעֲל֥וֹת <S%H5927><s%> of offering הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offerings וְהַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> and the peace offerings וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> he blessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> the people בְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיְחַלֵּק֙ <S%H2505><s%> And he dealt לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to everyone אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to every one יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> both man וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> and woman לְאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> to every one כִּכַּר־ <S%H3603><s%> a loaf לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of bread וְאֶשְׁפָּ֖ר <S%H829><s%> and a good piece of flesh וַאֲשִׁישָֽׁה׃ <S%H809><s%> and a flagon

וַיִּתֵּ֞ן <S%H5414><s%> And he appointed לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> before אֲר֧וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> [certain] of the Levites מְשָׁרְתִ֑ים <S%H8334><s%> to minister וּלְהַזְכִּיר֙ <S%H2142><s%> and to record וּלְהוֹד֣וֹת <S%H3034><s%> and to thank וּלְהַלֵּ֔ל <S%H1984><s%> and praise לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ

אָסָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> Asaph הָרֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the chief וּמִשְׁנֵ֣הוּ <S%H4932><s%> and next זְכַרְיָ֑ה <S%H2148><s%> to him Zechariah יְעִיאֵ֡ל <S%H3273><s%> Jeiel וּשְׁמִֽירָמ֡וֹת <S%H8070><s%> and Shemiramoth וִֽיחִיאֵ֡ל <S%H3171><s%> and Jehiel וּמַתִּתְיָ֡ה <S%H4993><s%> and Mattithiah וֶאֱלִיאָ֡ב <S%H446><s%> and Eliab וּבְנָיָהוּ֩ <S%H1141><s%> and Benaiah וְעֹבֵ֨ד אֱדֹ֜ם <S%H5654><s%> and Obededom וִֽיעִיאֵ֗ל <S%H3273><s%> and Jeiel בִּכְלֵ֤י <S%H3627><s%> instruments נְבָלִים֙ <S%H5035><s%> harps וּבְכִנֹּר֔וֹת <S%H3658><s%> and with harps וְאָסָ֖ף <S%H623><s%> but Asaph בַּֽמְצִלְתַּ֥יִם <S%H4700><s%> with cymbals מַשְׁמִֽיעַ׃ <S%H8085><s%> made a sound

וּבְנָיָ֥הוּ <S%H1141><s%> Benaiah וְיַחֲזִיאֵ֖ל <S%H3166><s%> also and Jahaziel הַכֹּהֲנִ֑ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests בַּחֲצֹצְר֣וֹת <S%H2689><s%> with trumpets תָּמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> continually לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Then on that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then נָתַ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> delivered דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David בָּרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> first לְהֹד֖וֹת <S%H3034><s%> [this psalm] to thank לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand אָסָ֖ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph וְאֶחָֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> and his brethren פ

הוֹד֤וּ <S%H3034><s%> Give thanks לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD קִרְא֣וּ <S%H7121><s%> call בִשְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> upon his name הוֹדִ֥יעוּ <S%H3045><s%> make known בָעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> among the people עֲלִילֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H5949><s%> his deeds

שִׁ֤ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> Sing לוֹ֙ זַמְּרוּ־ <S%H2167><s%> unto him sing psalms ל֔וֹ שִׂ֖יחוּ <S%H7878><s%> unto him talk בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all נִפְלְאֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H6381><s%> ye of all his wondrous

הִֽתְהַֽלְלוּ֙ <S%H1984><s%> Glory בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H6944><s%> ye in his holy יִשְׂמַ֕ח <S%H8055><s%> of them rejoice לֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> let the heart מְבַקְשֵׁ֥י <S%H1245><s%> that seek יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD
דִּרְשׁ֤וּ <S%H1875><s%> Seek יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְעֻזּ֔וֹ <S%H5797><s%> and his strength בַּקְּשׁ֥וּ <S%H1245><s%> seek פָנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> his face תָּמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> continually

זִכְר֗וּ <S%H2142><s%> Remember נִפְלְאֹתָיו֙ <S%H6381><s%> his marvellous אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> works that he hath done מֹפְתָ֖יו <S%H4159><s%> his wonders וּמִשְׁפְּטֵי־ <S%H4941><s%> and the judgments פִֽיהוּ׃ <S%H6310><s%> of his mouth

זֶ֚רַע <S%H2233><s%> O ye seed יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַבְדּ֔וֹ <S%H5650><s%> his servant בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> ye children יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob בְּחִירָֽיו׃ <S%H972><s%> his chosen ones

ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> He [is] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [are] in all the earth מִשְׁפָּטָֽיו׃ <S%H4941><s%> his judgments

זִכְר֤וּ <S%H2142><s%> Be ye mindful לְעוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> always בְּרִית֔וֹ <S%H1285><s%> of his covenant דָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> the word צִוָּ֖ה <S%H6680><s%> [which] he commanded לְאֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> to a thousand דּֽוֹר׃ <S%H1755><s%> generations

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which כָּרַת֙ <S%H3772><s%> [Even of the covenant] which he made אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> with Abraham וּשְׁבוּעָת֖וֹ <S%H7621><s%> and of his oath לְיִצְחָֽק׃ <S%H3327><s%> unto Isaac

וַיַּעֲמִידֶ֤הָ <S%H5975><s%> And hath confirmed לְיַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> the same to Jacob לְחֹ֔ק <S%H2706><s%> for a law לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> [and] to Israel בְּרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> covenant עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> [for] an everlasting

לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> Saying לְךָ֙ אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> Unto thee will I give אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> the land כְּנָ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan חֶ֖בֶל <S%H2256><s%> the lot נַחֲלַתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H5159><s%> of your inheritance
בִּֽהְיֽוֹתְכֶם֙ <S%H1961><s%> were only מְתֵ֣י <S%H4962><s%> A few מִסְפָּ֔ר <S%H4557><s%> number כִּמְעַ֖ט <S%H4592><s%> even a few וְגָרִ֥ים <S%H1481><s%> and strangers בָּֽהּ׃

וַיִּֽתְהַלְּכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> And [when] they went מִגּ֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> from nation אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גּ֔וֹי <S%H1471><s%> to nation וּמִמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <S%H4467><s%> and from [one] kingdom אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> people אַחֵֽר׃ <S%H312><s%> to another

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הִנִּ֤יחַ <S%H3240><s%> He suffered לְאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> no man לְעָשְׁקָ֔ם <S%H6231><s%> to do them wrong וַיּ֥וֹכַח <S%H3198><s%> yea he reproved עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> their sakes מְלָכִֽים׃ <S%H4428><s%> kings

אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> no תִּגְּעוּ֙ <S%H5060><s%> [Saying] Touch בִּמְשִׁיחָ֔י <S%H4899><s%> not mine anointed וּבִנְבִיאַ֖י <S%H5030><s%> and do my prophets אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no תָּרֵֽעוּ׃ <S%H7489><s%> no harm פ

שִׁ֤ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> Sing לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> all the earth בַּשְּׂר֥וּ <S%H1319><s%> shew forth מִיּֽוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> from day אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to day יְשׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H3444><s%> his salvation

סַפְּר֤וּ <S%H5608><s%> Declare בַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּבוֹד֔וֹ <S%H3519><s%> his glory בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> among all nations נִפְלְאֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H6381><s%> his marvellous works

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> For גָד֨וֹל <S%H1419><s%> For great יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] the LORD וּמְהֻלָּל֙ <S%H1984><s%> to be praised מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> and greatly וְנוֹרָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> he also [is] to be feared ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> above all gods

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> For all the gods הָעַמִּים֙ <S%H5971><s%> of the people אֱלִילִ֔ים <S%H457><s%> [are] idols וַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD שָׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> made

ה֤וֹד <S%H1935><s%> Glory וְהָדָר֙ <S%H1926><s%> and honour לְפָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> [are] in his presence עֹ֥ז <S%H5797><s%> strength וְחֶדְוָ֖ה <S%H2304><s%> and gladness בִּמְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> [are] in his place

הָב֤וּ <S%H3051><s%> Give לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <S%H4940><s%> ye kindreds עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people הָב֥וּ <S%H3051><s%> give לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כָּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> glory וָעֹֽז׃ <S%H5797><s%> and strength

הָב֥וּ <S%H3051><s%> Give לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> the glory שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> [due] unto his name שְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> bring מִנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> an offering וּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> and come לְפָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> before הִשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ <S%H7812><s%> him worship לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּהַדְרַת־ <S%H1927><s%> in the beauty קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> of holiness

חִ֤ילוּ <S%H2342><s%> Fear מִלְּפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> before כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> him all the earth אַף־ <S%H637><s%> Indeed תִּכּ֥וֹן <S%H3559><s%> also shall be stable תֵּבֵ֖ל <S%H8398><s%> the world בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest תִּמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4131><s%> that it be not moved

יִשְׂמְח֤וּ <S%H8056><s%> glad הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> Let the heavens וְתָגֵ֣ל <S%H1523><s%> rejoice הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and let the earth וְיֹאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> and let [men] say בַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> among the nations יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מָלָֽךְ׃ <S%H4427><s%> reigneth

יִרְעַ֤ם <S%H7481><s%> roar הַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> Let the sea וּמְלוֹא֔וֹ <S%H4393><s%> and the fulness יַעֲלֹ֥ץ <S%H5970><s%> rejoice הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> thereof let the fields וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בּֽוֹ׃

אָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> Then יְרַנְּנ֖וּ <S%H7442><s%> sing out עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> Then shall the trees הַיָּ֑עַר <S%H3293><s%> of the wood מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> at the presence יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֖א <S%H935><s%> because he cometh לִשְׁפּ֥וֹט <S%H8199><s%> to judge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

הוֹד֤וּ <S%H3034><s%> O give thanks לַיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> for [he is] good כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

וְאִמְר֕וּ <S%H559><s%> And say הוֹשִׁיעֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H3467><s%> ye Save אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> us O God יִשְׁעֵ֔נוּ <S%H3468><s%> of our salvation וְקַבְּצֵ֥נוּ <S%H6908><s%> and gather us together וְהַצִּילֵ֖נוּ <S%H5337><s%> and deliver מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> us from the heathen לְהֹדוֹת֙ <S%H3034><s%> that we may give thanks לְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשֶׁ֔ךָ <S%H6944><s%> to thy holy לְהִשְׁתַּבֵּ֖חַ <S%H7623><s%> [and] glory בִּתְהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8416><s%> in thy praise

בָּר֤וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> From הָעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וְעַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> even הָעֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> and ever וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> said כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אָמֵ֔ן <S%H543><s%> Amen וְהַלֵּ֖ל <S%H1984><s%> and praised לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD פ

וַיַּֽעֲזָב־ <S%H5800><s%> So he left שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> there before אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְאָסָ֖ף <S%H623><s%> Asaph וּלְאֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren לְשָׁרֵ֞ת <S%H8334><s%> to minister לִפְנֵ֧י <S%H6440><s%> before הָאָר֛וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark תָּמִ֖יד <S%H8548><s%> continually לִדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> work י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as every day's בְּיוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H3117><s%> required

וְעֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֛ם <S%H5654><s%> And Obededom וַאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> with their brethren שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <S%H8346><s%> threescore וּשְׁמוֹנָ֑ה <S%H8083><s%> and eight וְעֹבֵ֨ד אֱדֹ֧ם <S%H5654><s%> Obededom בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> also the son יְדִית֛וּן <S%H3038><s%> of Jeduthun וְחֹסָ֖ה <S%H2621><s%> and Hosah לְשֹׁעֲרִֽים׃ <S%H7778><s%> [to be] porters

וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> צָד֣וֹק <S%H6659><s%> And Zadok הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְאֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> and his brethren הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before מִשְׁכַּ֣ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בַּבָּמָ֖ה <S%H1116><s%> in the high place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּגִבְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H1391><s%> that [was] at Gibeon

לְֽהַעֲלוֹת֩ <S%H5927><s%> To offer עֹל֨וֹת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings לַיהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִזְבַּ֧ח <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar הָעֹלָ֛ה <S%H5930><s%> of the burnt offering תָּמִ֖יד <S%H8548><s%> continually לַבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> morning וְלָעָ֑רֶב <S%H6153><s%> and evening וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַכָּתוּב֙ <S%H3789><s%> and [to do] according to all that is written בְּתוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> in the law יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֖ה <S%H6680><s%> which he commanded עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וְעִמָּהֶם֙ <S%H5973><s%> With הֵימָ֣ן <S%H1968><s%> And with them Heman וִֽידוּת֔וּן <S%H3038><s%> and Jeduthun וּשְׁאָר֙ <S%H7605><s%> and the rest הַבְּרוּרִ֔ים <S%H1305><s%> that were chosen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who נִקְּב֖וּ <S%H5344><s%> who were expressed בְּשֵׁמ֑וֹת <S%H8034><s%> by name לְהֹדוֹת֙ <S%H3034><s%> to give thanks לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because לְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> because his mercy

וְעִמָּהֶם֩ <S%H5973><s%> and with הֵימָ֨ן <S%H1968><s%> And with them Heman וִֽידוּת֜וּן <S%H3038><s%> and Jeduthun חֲצֹצְר֤וֹת <S%H2689><s%> with trumpets וּמְצִלְתַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4700><s%> and cymbals לְמַשְׁמִיעִ֔ים <S%H8085><s%> for those that should make a sound וּכְלֵ֖י <S%H3627><s%> instruments שִׁ֣יר <S%H7892><s%> and with musical הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יְדוּת֖וּן <S%H3038><s%> of Jeduthun לַשָּֽׁעַר׃ <S%H8179><s%> [were] porters

וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> departed כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> to his house וַיִּסֹּ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> returned דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> and David לְבָרֵ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> to bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> his house פ
